DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy 3 dos bimatoprost solution compare vehicle over-the-counter ( OTC ) minoxidil 2 % solution woman female pattern hair loss . All treatment provide double-blinded fashion except minoxidil 2 % solution provide open-label .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Bimatoprost Treatment Women With Female Pattern Hair Loss
DOC.criteria: Mild moderate female pattern hair loss ongoing hair loss least 1 year Willingness microdottattoo apply scalp Willingness maintain hair style , length hair color study Drug alcohol abuse within 12 month HIV positive Received hair transplant scalp reduction Use hair weave , hair extension wigs within 3 month Oral topical minoxidil treatment within 6 month Application topical steroid nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) scalp within 4 week
